readability.readability_summary: EXCELLENT - Content is scannable, engaging, and accessible to target German audience

signals: +1.0: Concrete examples (Havelberg 200k, Bietigheim dates, Ehorses 19k listings)
+0.5: Practical step-by-step guides (Gesundheits-Check section with 4 konkrete Schritte)
missing_signals: -0.5: No own photos/videos (Could add image placeholder for Havelberg/Bietigheim events)
-0.5: Limited 'we/I' perspective (Mostly educational tone, could add author experience perspective)

signals: +1.0: Detailed marketplace analysis (Ehorses, Pferde.de, Landwirt.com, Caballo, BillyRider comparison)
+0.5: Multi-year market data (Since 1750 for Havelberg, 100+ years for Bietigheim, established platforms)
+0.3: Technical terminology correctly explained (Stammbaum, Ausbildungsstand, Warmblüter)
missing_signals: -0.7: Author credentials not explicitly stated (Should add 'Expert Author: Horse Market Analyst' or similar)
-0.2: Limited veterinary/breeding expertise depth (Health check section is basic)

signals: +0.8: Official event data (Havelberg, Bietigheim, Leonberg dates from government sources)
+0.5: Marketplace statistics (19,000 Ehorses listings, platform comparisons)
+0.5: Regional horse breeding data (Bayern Haflinger, Württemberg Warmblüter)
missing_signals: -0.7: Limited external citations (No inline source links to Havelberg.de, Bietigheim-bissingen.de)
-0.2: No recent academic/veterinary references (Could cite German horse breeding associations)

signals: +0.7: Claims backed with data (200.000 Besucher, 19.000+ Inserate, price ranges, dates)
+0.5: Practical transparency (Mentions parking fees, vet costs, negotiation ranges)
missing_signals: -0.3: No source citations/hyperlinks in body text
-0.2: Limited pro/contra (Online vs. Traditional section good, but could expand)
-0.1: No transparency on data recency (When were Ehorses listings counted?)

seo_technical.meta_description: Pferdemarkt Deutschland 2025: Havelberger Markt mit 200.000 Besuchern, Bietigheim, Online-Plattformen mit 19.000+ Inserate. Tipps für Pferdekauf.
seo_technical.meta_description_cta_warning: Missing call-to-action. Consider: '...Tipps für Pferdekauf. Jetzt passende Märkte entdecken.'

competitive_positioning.content_length_assessment: Article is 353 words SHORTER than target (1597). Should aim for +1,600 for top-3 median +30% coverage. Currently only +1.1% vs. Rank#1 (Ehorses).

missing_topics: Seller perspective/how to list a horse (Only buyer perspective)

freshness_score.freshness_status: GOOD (2025 event data current, but lacks recent studies/2024 statistics)

paa_covered: Wo ist der größte Pferdemarkt in Deutschland? ✓
Wie viel kostet ein Pferd auf dem Pferdemarkt? ✓
paa_missing: Was kostet Parken auf dem Pferdemarkt in Oldenburg? ✗
Wann findet der Pferdemarkt 2025 in Burgdorf statt? △ (Mentioned briefly, not dedicated)

content_hook.first_100_words: Der Pferdemarkt ist eine faszinierende Tradition in Deutschland mit einer langen Geschichte. Aber wie findet man heute das richtige Pferd – online auf großen Plattformen oder auf traditionellen Märkten? Unsere Übersicht zeigt beide Wege mit allen wichtigen Informationen.

problem_statement.text: How to find right horse - online vs. traditional?

warnings.message: Primary keyword 'pferdemarkt' density is 1.53%, exceeding optimal range (0.8-1.2%). Reduce by 3-5 instances to reach 0.9-1.0%.
warnings.impact: Risk of keyword stuffing penalty from Google. Must reduce.

warnings.message: Only 1 internal link found, minimum 3 required. Missing contextual links to /ratgeber/pferd-gesundheitscheck and /ratgeber/pferd-kaufen-kosten.
warnings.impact: Weak internal link structure reduces SEO authority distribution and user journey.

warnings.message: Article is 353 words (22%) shorter than target (1597 words). Currently 1244 words, should be 1,600+ for competitive positioning.
warnings.impact: Rank#1 (Ehorses) has 1,231 words, but target competitor analysis recommends +1,600 for comprehensive hub content. Content feels rushed.

warnings.message: Schema-article.json claims 2850 words, but actual article is 1244 words. Schema is inaccurate.
warnings.impact: Google may see contradictory metadata. Must update schema wordCount to 1244.

warnings.message: Meta description lacks clear call-to-action. Currently ends with 'Tipps für Pferdekauf.' Should add action-oriented CTA.
warnings.impact: Slightly lower CTR potential. Recommend: '...Tipps für Pferdekauf. Jetzt entdecken.'
warnings.recommended_fix: Pferdemarkt Deutschland 2025: Havelberger Markt mit 200.000 Besuchern, Bietigheim, Online-Plattformen mit 19.000+ Inserate. Jetzt vergleichen & kaufen.

warnings.message: No explicit author credentials or expertise statement. Article reads as general information rather than expert analysis.

warnings.eeat_impact: E-E-A-T score could improve from 6.8 to 7.2+ with credibility anchor.
